pullRequest.title: [562503] OAIB Insert Remove Operational Activities wrongly filters activities allocated to actors
pullRequest.bodyText:
Bug: 562503
Change-Id: If672108c2801c3f8f6a6a9d6b368c017a37de239
Signed-off-by: Philippe DUL philippe.dul@thalesgroup.com

nodes.bodyText: Its now consistent with SDFB / LDFB and PDFB
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -418,14 +418,14 @@
           <ownedTools xsi:type="tool:ToolDescription" documentation="Insert/Remove Operational Activities. Create or delete graphical objects corresponding to already existing Operational Activities. Removing an Operational Activity graphical object from the diagram does not delete the Operational Activity from the model. This tool does not modify the semantic model." name="functions" label="%oa.oaib.functions" iconPath="/org.polarsys.capella.core.sirius.analysis/icons/full/obj16/ShowHide.gif">
             <element name="element"/>
             <elementView name="elementView">
-              <subVariables xsi:type="tool:AcceleoVariable" name="visibleFunctions" computationExpression="aql:self.void2Null(elementView.getDisplayedAbstractFunctions()->select(getDisplayedAbstractFunction | getDisplayedAbstractFunction.allocationBlocks->filter(cs::Component)->select(c | c.isActor())->size() = 0))"/>
-              <subVariables xsi:type="tool:AcceleoVariable" name="visibleFunctionViews" computationExpression="aql:self.void2Null(elementView.getDisplayedAbstractFunctionViews()->select(getDisplayedAbstractFunctionView | getDisplayedAbstractFunctionView.target.allocationBlocks->filter(cs::Component)->select(c | c.isActor())->size() = 0))"/>
+              <subVariables xsi:type="tool:AcceleoVariable" name="visibleFunctions" computationExpression="aql:self.void2Null(elementView.getDisplayedAbstractFunctions())"/>

commit.message:
[562503] OAIB Insert Remove Operational Activities wrongly filters
activities allocated to actors

Bug: 562503
Change-Id: If672108c2801c3f8f6a6a9d6b368c017a37de239
Signed-off-by: Philippe DUL <philippe.dul@thalesgroup.com>
